mapper.insert: -- 新增状态信息 -- INSERT INTO temp (temp_pid, temp_uid, temp_state, temp_useful, temp_unuseful, temp_update_date, temp_content, temp_status) VALUES (#{pid}, #{uid}, #{state}, 0, 0, now(), #{content}, 0)
mapper.select: -- 列出停车场最近 10 分钟的状态信息, 以及用户的投票 -- SELECT tmp.*, coalesce(v.voting_useful, 0) as my_opt FROM voting v RIGHT JOIN (SELECT * FROM temp WHERE temp_pid = #{pid} AND temp_update_date > date_sub(now(), INTERVAL '0 00:10:00' DAY_SECOND) ORDER BY temp_update_date DESC LIMIT 5) tmp ON v.voting_uid = #{uid} AND v.voting_tid = tmp.temp_id
-- 列出10分钟内的状态信息 -- SELECT * FROM temp WHERE temp_pid = #{pid} AND temp_update_date > date_sub(now(), INTERVAL '0 00:10:00' DAY_SECOND)

-- 分页列出用户提交的状态信息 -- SELECT tt.*, tp.parking_name FROM temp AS tt INNER JOIN parking AS tp ON tt.temp_pid = parking_id WHERE tt.temp_uid = #{uid} ORDER BY tt.temp_update_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{rowCount}
mapper.update: -- 增加状态信息的有价值数量 -- UPDATE temp SET temp_useful = temp_useful + 1 WHERE temp_id = #{tid};
-- 增加状态信息的无价值数量 -- UPDATE temp SET temp_unuseful = temp_unuseful + 1 WHERE temp_id = #{tid};
